title: Not a Single word from Riot
body:
The Day is almost up here in OCE, and Snowdown has not begun.
The new skins aren't in shop
The new Summoner Icons aren't here
No new Ward skins
"LOTPK" Game mode is MIA
And why is that?
We don't know, Riot hardly ever communicates in times like this. 
The best theories is that it is run off NA time, and OCE Riot hasn't bothered to change it. Now, they are trying to hide rather than own up to the mistake they made.
If Riot really did own their mistakes like they frequently say they do, we would have an explanation as to the delay.
Seriously Riot, how long does it take to make a single forum post?
Obviously too long

replies.body: Well it is the 16th. NA just got their skins and so did we. I don't know why stupid people are complaining.
People are acting as if this is a travesty, but all it means is that the ending of Snowdown will run off NA time too, so its not like we are losing a day of Snowdown...
its after office hours in Sydney so stop being so entitled and learn to be patient
